name: Object Permanence (ryankann)
description:
You wake up in a strange, dark dungeon (classic).  Solve the puzzles by taking advantage of the fact that some things only happen when they aren't being observed.

Controls (Keyboard/Xbox Controller):

WASD/Analog Stick to move.

Space/A to jump.

Hold left click/right trigger to close your eyes.

Press E/X to interact with the bells.

+/- to increase/decrease mouse sensitivity.

Hold ESC to exit.

IMPORTANT NOTE: The controls have only been tested on Keyboard and Mouse. Use a Controller at your own risk.

Didn't have time to work on everything like volume sliders, so I apologize if things are unclear or janky!
